publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1394 John Farquhar Munro: SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle-That the Parliament condemns the decision by the Scottish Premier League (SPL) to reject the application of Inverness Caledonian Thistle to join the SPL; further condemns its action in previous years in preventing Falkirk Football Club from entering the SPL; believes that this decision brings Scottish football into disrepute by offending the basic principle of advancement on merit, and calls on the SPL to reconsider its decision and agree to Inverness Caledonian Thistle joining the SPL in the coming season and to the lifting of 10,000 seat stadium criterion so allowing home games to be played in Inverness.

S2M-1394 SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 1 June 2004) Fergus Ewing*, Maureen Macmillan*, George Lyon*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Richard Baker*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Alex Johnstone*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Murdo Fraser*, David Mundell*

S2M-1394 SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 1 June 2004) Richard Lochhead*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Brian Adam*, Mary Scanlon*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mike Rumbles*, Stewart Stevenson*, Jim Mather*, Christine Grahame*, Linda Fabiani*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Iain Smith*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Phil Gallie*, Dennis Canavan*, Rob Gibson*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Carolyn Leckie*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Campbell Martin*

S2M-1394 John Farquhar Munro: SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle-That the Parliament condemns the decision by the Scottish Premier League (SPL) to reject the application of Inverness Caledonian Thistle to join the SPL; further condemns its action in previous years in preventing Falkirk Football Club from entering the SPL; believes that this decision brings Scottish football into disrepute by offending the basic principle of advancement on merit, and calls on the SPL to reconsider its decision and agree to Inverness Caledonian Thistle joining the SPL in the coming season and to the lifting of 10,000 seat stadium criterion so allowing home games to be played in Inverness. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Maureen Macmillan, George Lyon, Eleanor Scott, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Richard Baker, Mr Jamie Stone, Alex Johnstone, Mrs Nanette Milne, Murdo Fraser, David Mundell, Richard Lochhead, Mr Adam Ingram, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Brian Adam, Mary Scanlon, Mike Pringle, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mike Rumbles, Stewart Stevenson, Jim Mather, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Margaret Mitchell, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Iain Smith, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Phil Gallie, Dennis Canavan, Rob Gibson, Mr Bruce McFee, Carolyn Leckie, Mr Mark Ruskell, Campbell Martin, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr David Davidson*, Mark Ballard*, John Swinburne*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1394 SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 1 June 2004) Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1394 SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 1 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1394 SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 1 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1394 SPL Rejection of Inverness Caledonian Thistle (lodged on 1 June 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
